troubleshooting.title: Web Author caches the IP of the License Server indefinitely

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: License server connection issue in when IP address of License Server changes

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: When security is enabled in , mapping from the DNS name of an external server (for example the License Server) to its IP address are cached indefinitely. If the server is set up to have a dynamic IP address, might attempt to use an outdated IP address, resulting in a failed connection.

steps-informal.p:
To adjust the TTL (time to live) for DNS caching in Java, follow these steps:
Open the <JAVA_HOME>/conf/security/java.security file in a text editor.
Locate the line that starts with networkaddress.cache.ttl
Change the line to networkaddress.cache.ttl=60
Save and close the file.
Restart for the changes to take effect.
